events.message: I received my package today but noticed that the product is broken and has a large scratch on the surface. This is very disappointing.
The reported issue about the broken and scratched product has been classified under the Product Defect category for proper handling.
The support case has been assigned to an agent specializing in handling product defect claims.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your item arrived damaged. I’m here to assist you with this issue.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged product and the packaging so that we can better assess the situation?
I have attached several clear photos showing the broken parts and deep scratches on the product, as well as the box it came in.
Thank you for the photos. We can either send you a replacement free of charge or issue you a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement as I really wanted this product, but I’m concerned about the delivery time and condition.
Your case has been escalated to our senior team to prioritize the replacement shipment and ensure extra care is taken in packaging.
We have processed a priority replacement order for you and dispatched it with enhanced packaging to prevent any damage.
Checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement product and that it arrived in perfect condition.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it’s in perfect condition. Thanks for handling this issue quickly.
We’re glad everything is resolved. Closing the case now, and please reach out if you need any further assistance.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback about your experience with our product defect handling process.
